name: GMTK GameJam 2020 Entry: Mayor Hussle
description:
Reupload of our entry to the GMTK GameJam 2020. The theme was "Out Of Control"!

Original description: 

DOWNLOAD for better experience (not as small)!

Youre the mayor! To keep your citizen happy, distribute funds to public institutions by physically carrying cash there. Also, try not to die!
